name: Can't Bear to be Apart
description:
Can't Bear to be Apart

A game developed by Samantha Smith at Azusa Pacific University

Contact - samanthasmith20@apu.edu

Description

In Can't Bear to be Apart, play as a small teddy bear who is making his way back home. See through his eyes as he makes the world change colors to spark joy in his adventure.

This game is a prototype, made for a game development class

Controls

WASD for movement, space to jump
